about_the_game:
All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

Welcome to the perverted metaverse. Here, you can enjoy orgies in virtual reality.
Through a combination of beautiful ladies with high visual quality, an audio experience that makes you think you are actually there, and VR controls with a high level of freedom, you can enjoy a perverted realm that is a cut above.

Game Explanation:
An experience that makes you feel as if you are actually there has been made possible through a high-resolution VR realm with a realistic stereophonic sound system.
You can fully enjoy the best erotic experiences by doing exactly as you please in various perverted scenarios.

Controls:
You can move freely around the VR realm with 6DoF. You can also toggle between moving freely and teleporting.
The actions that you can take include grabbing things and enjoying pole dances. Doors open automatically.
The actions that you can take include going to a room and going on stage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
